about_the_game:
Summary:
Imprecision is a first/third person, action-adventure game set in the Scandinavian Middle Ages. In Imprecision, you play as a lone archer, Örvar, who is training to take down The Black Knights of Bjørn and their kingdom. King Bjørn the Bloodthirsty and The Black Knights have taken over the nation destroying a lot of the land and enslaving towns. If you are not part of the royal kingdom then you are a thrall. You are determined to take back what is yours.

Note: During Early Access, player data may be reset. Missing Story Cutscenes and levels are WIP. Precision Levels and Level 1 & 2 of the story are available.

How to Play:
Story Mode - Fight your way through monsters on each level, to reach the castle and take down The Black Knights of Bjørn.
Precision Mode - Precision mode is 50 levels that test your accuracy and preciseness. Shoot the targets that spawn. Each ring gives a different amount of points. Aim for the bullseye! When all targets are destroyed the level will end and you will receive a star rating for the level.

Controls:
Move: WASD/Left Stick
Look: Mouse/Right Stick
Aim: RMB/Left Trigger
Pullback/Fire: LMB/Right Trigger
Run: Shift/Left Stick Click
Jump: Space/A

Unique Selling Features:
Archery
Medieval
Voxel Art Style
Third/First Person
Precision Levels

3D Models:
Created in MagicaVoxel.

Background Music:
Medieval Loop One by Alexander Nakarada
Music promoted by free-stock-music
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)

name: Imprecision Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 2GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 560, Geforce GTX 1050)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 360 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 4 GHz (AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Intel i5 8600)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 4GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 580, Geforce GTX 1080)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Imprecision is a first/third person, action game set in The Middle Ages. In Imprecision, you play as a lone archer, Örvar, who is training to take down The Black Knights of Bjørn and their kingdom. You are determined to defeat King Bjørn the Bloodthirsty and take back what is yours.
